response.overview: TEASER juxtaposes images and texts with a soundtrack on a tilted LCD screen and incorporates slogans drawn from film advertisements such as ‘THE CONTROVERSIAL NEW MASTERPIECE THAT EVERYONE’S TALKING ABOUT’. The title makes reference to the way film advertising catches the viewer’s imagination and promises an exciting experience. It was originally shown in the exhibition YOUNG-HAE CHANG HEAVY INDUSTRIES PRESENTS: DOWN IN FUKUOKA WITH THE BELARUSIAN BLUES at Gallery Hyundai in Seoul in 2010.
response.title: TEASER
